titles.title: A resolution to honor and thank Federal Highway Administrator Ray Barnhart for his dedicated efforts to improve the Nation's highway system.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 12/9/1987--Introduced. Honors Ray A. Barnhart, retiring Federal Highway Administrator, for his efforts to preserve and improve the Federal-Aid Highway System.
